de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.collision

Class ImageOutline

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.collision.ImageOutline

  • public class ImageOutline
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an outline of an image as Area and BufferedImage. Color of pixel 0/0 is used as filter, tolerance is 0. Can also gives the used TwoToneImageFilter of the image. Calculation costs some time.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageOutline(java.awt.image.BufferedImage thatImage)
      Creates a outline of an image as Area and BufferedImage.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.geom.Area getArea()
      Gets a new instance of the outlined area.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getOutline()
      Gets the outlined image.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSource()
      Gets the used source image which was outlined.
      TwoToneImageFilter getTwoTone()
      Gets the TwoToneImageFilter which was used for outlining.
